author: Eli the Computer Guy
description:
RSVP for Classes at - http://www.SiliconDojo.com
Support Classes at - https://donorbox.org/etcg
LinkedIn at - https://www.linkedin.com/in/eli-etherton-a15362211/

Got Client Acquisition?

The biggest killer of tech companies and startup is client acquisition. If you can't figure out how to scale customer growth the best idea in the world won't make a viable business.

Steve Newman is the Director for Business Development for ERC Broadband a local ISP. He's spent years in sales and Biz Dev, but started out in the standard world of IT.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/snewman72/

We will discuss what the current landscape looks like for client acquisitions for tech companies. What it's like to Biz Dev in an area like Asheville NC. And discuss what the current macro forces look like to someone who's trying to close sales.
title: Steve Newman - Director of Business Development for ISP (ERC Broadband)
